txt.en: 'Hail, [placeholder]! I am in need of your assistance in completing a number of missions as part of our efforts to bolster Prince Durin and the Gabil'akkâ in their preparations and ensure the welfare of our brethren at distant dwarf-holds. We must be well-prepared when the time comes to reclaim Mount Gundabad at last!\n\n'Would you assist me and the Kharum-ubnâr by completing several of these missions?'
Vorthur Smokebreath can be found at Akrâz-zahar, in Erebor.\n\nYou should talk to Vorthur Smokebreath.

At the behest of King Thorin Stonehelm, the Kharum-ubnâr have enlisted the aid of skilled adventurers to secure distant dwarf-holds and ensure the success of Prince Durin and the Gabil'akkâ in the forthcoming reclamation of Mount Gundabad.
Vorthur Smokebreath can be found at Akrâz-zahar, in Erebor.\n\nYou should talk to Vorthur Smokebreath and complete missions for the Kharum-ubnâr.

'I thank you for your assistance, [placeholder]. We of the Kharum-ubnâr cannot be everywhere, but you have done much to aid us.\n\n'Hail Thorin Stonehelm, King Under the Mountain! Glory to Durin's Folk!'
